trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_SEQ_00<tab>The time has come for Lord Hien to return to Doma.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gosetsu.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Hien.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_000<tab>Let's go. Everyone is waiting for us back at the House of the Fierce!
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Heh heh...I wonder what Yugiri will have to say when we tell her of our adventures?
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_010<tab>Right, then. To the House of the Fierce. With me, my friends!
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_015<tab>Err, remind me─what part of Yanxia is this again?
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_020<tab>Ahh...this air that fills my breast, these sounds which resound in my ears. I am home.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>I have not used this road before, but... Ah. I recognize this place.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_031<tab>The House of the Fierce should lie somewhere to the south. I will go on ahead and inform the sentries of our master's return.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_040<tab>Huh, I didn't realize there was another entrance.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_050<tab>Here we are! I wonder if they all are gathered inside, waiting...perhaps expecting a speech or some such...
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_051<tab>Well! No matter! I shall have to do what I shall have to do!
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_060<tab>So...have we got a plan? Tell me someone's got a plan.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>Alphinaud has been hard at work devising our strategy to seize Doma Castle. I'm sure he will be happy to share the details with you all shortly.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_070<tab>No time to soak it in. We have work to do.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_YUGIRI_000_075<tab>Not that I doubted you for a moment, but I am relieved to see him returned.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_080<tab>All is in place. We need but commit to action and see it through to the end.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_YAGORO_000_085<tab>Lord Hien has returned! Lord Hien has returned! And together we will drive the imperials out of Doma once and for all!
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HANAME_000_086<tab>I knew Lord Hien only by name and reputation until today. There is no denying that he has a presence...
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>Once more, welcome back. It is good to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>Ah, yes. There is another recent development we neglected to share with you.
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_092<tab>Alisaie and I have been hard at work attempting to restore the aetheryte here to its former glory...and I am pleased to inform you that we succeeded!
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_093<tab>Suffice it to say, it should prove a boon for travel─well, for those replete with anima like you, at least...
